title: Hotel Mekong
notes: 2012 Apichatpong Weerasethakul experimental Thai film blending documentary and fiction about ghosts along Mekong River

title: Howl – Das Geheul (D/USA ´2013)
notes: 2010 Rob Epstein/Jeffrey Friedman film about Allen Ginsberg's famous poem and obscenity trial, James Franco as Ginsberg

title: Hundertjährige, der die Rechnung nicht beza (_/TR)
corrected: Der Hundertjährige, der die Rechnung nicht bezahlte und verschwand
notes: 2016 Swedish sequel to 2013 film, based on Jonas Jonasson novel - distinctive long title

title: Hustlers – Rache ist sexy (USA ´2019_/Trailer)
notes: 2019 Lorene Scafaria crime drama with Jennifer Lopez, Constance Wu about strippers drugging Wall Street clients

title: Ich habe ein Gedicht (ISR/F ´2014_/Trailer)
notes: 2014 Nadav Lapid Israeli film, English: The Kindergarten Teacher, about teacher obsessed with child prodigy poet

title: Ich war zu Hause, aber … (D/SERB ´2019_DNF)
notes: 2019 Angela Schanelec contemplative German drama, Berlin Silver Bear winner - distinctive elliptical style

title: If …
notes: 1968 Lindsay Anderson British film about rebellion at English boarding school, Malcolm McDowell debut - Palme d'Or winner

title: Into the Wild - Geschichte eines Aussteigers
notes: 2007 Sean Penn film about Christopher McCandless based on Jon Krakauer book, Emile Hirsch - true story of Alaska dropout

title: Irgenwann ist auch mal gut (D ´2020)
notes: 2020 German film - typo: Irgendwann not Irgenwann, distinctive colloquial title
